description:
No more wasted tape. This little adapter lets you mount your brush onto any nearby stick, so you can clean those hard to reach holds.

  • Adjustable jaws fit on a wide variety of sticks and brushes
  • One end is on a lever locking ball joint, making it easy to dial in the right angle
  • Large wing nuts make cinching things down… well, a cinch
name: Flashed Lobster Claw Stick Brush Adapter
